metadata.title: CVE-2013-1436 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The XMonad.Hooks.DynamicLog module in xmonad-contrib before 0.11.2 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a web page title, whichactivates the commands when the user clicks on the xmobar window title, asdemonstrated using an action tag.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libghc-xmonad-contrib-prof - 0.11.2-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xmonad-contrib package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.2-1build1').
